d.f: ￹￺to trust * have faith in￻信任，信賴，對…有信心

e: ￹`O~ `pi~`ti'er~`an~ `ita~ `ci~`~ `Yis~.￺Jesus is the object of our faith / the one to be trusted.￻耶穌是我們信仰的對象，是值得我們信賴的那一位
￹`O~ `nano~ `pi~`ti'er~ `ita~ `ci~`~ `Kristoan~ `ko~ `saka~ `ma~`'orip~ `kita~.￺We are saved on the basis of our faith / trust in Christ.￻我們因相信耶穌 基督而得救
d.f: ￹￺be faithful * trustworthy￻忠實的，耿直的，可信賴的
